name: Gone Quiet Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the submarine named that was discussed in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Portland.

	The submarine was a sea wolf class submarine and was supposed to report in at 2:00 PM, but hadn't so Leo and Nancy got teams ready to go in and get it if necessary.

questions.text: Why were President Bartlet and Charlie going to New Hampshire?
questions.correct: President Bartlet was turning in his nomination for President
options: President Bartlet was meeting Abbey at their farm
Charlie was going to New Hampshire for his birthday present
questions.explanation:
President Bartlet was turning in his nomination for President.

	The President told Charlie that this was the last time he could ever run for anything. He was waylaid from getting on Marine One by Leo who told him that the submarine may have gone quiet.

questions.text: What song was CJ singing in her office?
questions.explanation:
I'm Too Sexy.

	Carol had to explain the song to CJ because she didn't know what it meant.

questions.text: Who played Albie Duncan, the Assistant Secretary of State?
questions.explanation:
Hal Holbrook.

	Hal Holbrook, Gerald McRaney, and William Devane have all starred in "The West Wing". Leo wanted Albie Duncan at the White House just in case they needed help making phone calls if it turned out there was a problem with the submarine. The President didn't want Albie in the White House because he knew Albie would scold him for losing a submarine.

questions.text: The one hundred and five million dollars that Toby found in the new budget was the same amount for the budget of what institution?
questions.explanation:
National Endowment for the Arts.

	Toby couldn't figure out why that amount sounded familiar until CJ told him that it was the budget for the NEA.

questions.text: How did Abbey break her ankle?
options: tripped while getting out of the limousine
questions.explanation:
hiking.

	When Abbey was wheeled into Oliver Babish's office, Oliver asked her how she hurt her ankle. Abbey told him she was hiking and the accident was in all the papers.

questions.text: Which one of the assistants told Toby that she was a simple girl?
questions.explanation:
Ginger.

	Toby asked Ginger if she knew what one hundred and five million dollars meant and Ginger made that comment.

True.

	The Portland radioed that it had gone quiet to keep from being spotted by a Luna class destroyer.

questions.text: Who did Oliver say was going to be the President's biggest liability?
questions.explanation:
Abbey.

	Oliver was going over a list of people that were going to testify against Abbey. This episode was submitted for Stockard Channing's 2002 Emmy win.

questions.text: Did the President have a reason for CJ on why he wanted to be President?
questions.explanation:
No.

	President: "I've been thinking about it for the last couple of hours. I almost had it."
